1006960.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Monster Evolutions: Battler Pack 1
1006960.description:
New from Cryptogene, this creature package comes with more than 1000 battler files! All creatures are created in 4 directions (isometric) and have up to 5 levels of evolution, so a small replica like Pokemon would be possible.

Features:

200 unique images x 5 file formats = 1000 files.
Dimensions (creature 1 Lv. 5) the other creatures are similar:
0.50x = ca. 131px * 118px
0.75x = ca. 197px * 177px
1.00x = ca. 263px * 237px
2.00x = ca. 526px * 474px
.svg = any size * any size
4 rendered .png versions (0.5x, 0.75x, 1x and 2x) but there’s also a svg* version of each file. This means you can scale it up without loss of quality (vector graphics)
Can be used with RPG Maker series or other game engines of your choice.

* There’s also a .svg version for the semi-realistic style, but because it’s textured it’s texture will be stretched a little if you scale it up.
